hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd $HOME/HOME/Handiespoir; USER=handiespoir_site PASS=Palmier-21 HOST=handiespoir.fr
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=2 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/public/www -X public/www/.git
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f
WPNAME='HandiEspoir' WPDBVERSION=`cat language/en-GB/en-GB.xml | grep "<version>" | cut -d '>' -f 2 | cut -d '<' -f 1` WPPLUGIN='' URL='http://www.handiespoir.fr/pvad/' TYPE='joomla' SERV='' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV"
